hierarchy.questionPrompt: generate questions to help the user write a summary of a story
hierarchy.resultPrompt: summarize this story based on the prompt and Q & As

hierarchy.questionPrompt: generate questions to help the user write a summary of a chapter in this story
hierarchy.resultPrompt: summarize this chapter based on the story summary, prompt, and Q & As

hierarchy.questionPrompt: generate questions to help the user write a scene in this chapter of the story
hierarchy.resultPrompt: write this scene based on the story summary, chapter summary, prompt, and Q & As
